column5: Good day everyone! Planning to go there. Anybody have been recently and give some advise what is allowed and what not? Thanks
Read the regulations. There are some very strict rules about fishing laketrout

I've been pulled over and checked twice this summer in PS.   Be very aware of the sanctuary boundaries if you plan on fishing lake trout.   As for other species, follow the regs for FMZ14 (And read the exceptions)
Thank you guys!Going to shore fishing so I will put an update once finished
